data.text:
Noisegasm: Sex Tide’s Video for “Laudanum”

Sick, sad readers: I am thrilled and honored to share with you the first official music video from my favorite act currently tearing shit up in the Midwest: Sex Tide. … Continue reading →

Style Ish: DIY jackets
